name: Spindle!
description:
Twirly is an incredibly fun and addictive arcade game!
The object of the game… Just keep Twirling!
Tap to twirl and clear the obstacles and make your way to the end of the level.

Play though tons of increasingly challenging levels and become a twirling champion! No one will ever be able to doubt your twirling skills.

Twirly has many features including:
Exciting skins to unlock for you to use.
Tons of tapping action!
Amazing levels that will get your brains working.

So why wait? Join the fun and download Twirly today.
